mutants.code:
def is_correct_translation(s: str, t: str) -> str:
    """
    Determines if the word t is the reverse of the word s.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The Berlandish word.
    t (str): The Birlandish word.

    Returns:
    str: "YES" if t is the reverse of s, otherwise "NO".
    """
    return 'YES' if s != t[::-1] else 'NO'

def is_correct_translation(s: str, t: str) -> str:
    """
    Determines if the word t is the reverse of the word s.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The Berlandish word.
    t (str): The Birlandish word.

    Returns:
    str: "YES" if t is the reverse of s, otherwise "NO".
    """
    return '' if s == t[::-1] else 'NO'

def is_correct_translation(s: str, t: str) -> str:
    """
    Determines if the word t is the reverse of the word s.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The Berlandish word.
    t (str): The Birlandish word.

    Returns:
    str: "YES" if t is the reverse of s, otherwise "NO".
    """
    return 'YES' if s == t[::-1] else ''

def is_correct_translation(s: str, t: str) -> str:
    """
    Determines if the word t is the reverse of the word s.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The Berlandish word.
    t (str): The Birlandish word.

    Returns:
    str: "YES" if t is the reverse of s, otherwise "NO".
    """
    return 'YES' if s == t[::+1] else 'NO'

def is_correct_translation(s: str, t: str) -> str:
    """
    Determines if the word t is the reverse of the word s.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The Berlandish word.
    t (str): The Birlandish word.

    Returns:
    str: "YES" if t is the reverse of s, otherwise "NO".
    """
    return 'YES' if s == t[::-2] else 'NO'

def is_correct_translation(s: str, t: str) -> str:
    """
    Determines if the word t is the reverse of the word s.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The Berlandish word.
    t (str): The Birlandish word.

    Returns:
    str: "YES" if t is the reverse of s, otherwise "NO".
    """
    return 'YES' if s == t[::-0] else 'NO'

def is_correct_translation(s: str, t: str) -> str:
    """
    Determines if the word t is the reverse of the word s.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The Berlandish word.
    t (str): The Birlandish word.

    Returns:
    str: "YES" if t is the reverse of s, otherwise "NO".
    """
    return 'YES' if s == t[::-0] else 'NO'

def is_correct_translation(s: str, t: str) -> str:
    """
    Determines if the word t is the reverse of the word s.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The Berlandish word.
    t (str): The Birlandish word.

    Returns:
    str: "YES" if t is the reverse of s, otherwise "NO".
    """
    return 'YES' if s == t[::--1] else 'NO'
